Car Stickers All property owner vehicles are required to have car stickers. These stickers are for owners and immediate family only. They are not intended for friends or employees. These stickers never expire and will only be deactivated if you sell your Innsbrook property or they are misused. Please note: Stickers must permanently adhere to the lower-left corner of the driver's side of the windshield. Stickers found to be affixed with temporary adhesive, such as tape, may be deactivated. Car stickers can be purchased for $15 each. Stop by our office at the Charrette Creek Commons or fill out this form: Property Owner Car Sticker Form . Send the form to 596 Aspen Way Drive, Innsbrook, MO, 63390 or email it to information@innsbrook-resort.com . In the office we accept cash, card, or checks. If $20 or more, you can charge it to your lot. Recreational Vehicles and Boat Registration All property-owner recreational vehicles and boats are required to have stickers. Stop by the Charrette Creek Commons to purchase recreation stickers for $5 each. They do not expire as long as the number is legible. A car sticker will also need to be purchased for golf carts/UTVs if they are to be driven through Innsbrook gates. Per the new rules, UTVs require recreation and car stickers. Car stickers are still optional for golf carts. ** New UTV Rules at Innsbrook - As of 12/1/23** *Please check the Property Owner Guide to see what vehicles and boats are permitted at Innsbrook. Fishing Regulations All of the lakes at Innsbrook are well stocked and a lake restoration program is in effect. Please abide by the following regulations on all lakes: Bass - harvest less than 12", return 12"-18", daily limit of two larger than 18" Bluegill - daily limit of four larger than 8" Catfish - daily limit of six larger than 12" Crappie - daily limit of four larger than 10" Green Sunfish - harvest all Paddlefish - return all Beach Etiquette We all share the beaches at Innsbrook so please be a good neighbor and follow these guidelines: POP-UP TENTS should be 20’ from the water to leave space for sunbathers. Please do not use a tent to reserve a beach spot, and take tents down at the end of the day. NO BOATS OR FISHING allowed in the swimming area, including between the beach and floating dock. DO NOT TIE YOUR BOATS up to the swimming/floating docks. This is dangerous for swimmers. The swimming/floating docks are for swimmers to enjoy. NO CHAIRS OR COOLERS on the docks, please. NO DIVING from the floating docks. Those who are not toilet-trained must wear SWIM DIAPERS — no one wants a repeat of the Caddy Shack pool scene (it’s really hard to drain and scrub a lake). Children in FLOTATION DEVICES should be supervised by an adult. Beach-goers AGES 15 & UNDER should be accompanied by an adult. NO LITTERING. As to cigarette butts, no one wants to sunbathe in an ashtray. NO PETS permitted in the beach area (there is one thing worse than sunbathing in an ashtray). MUSIC should be for your listening pleasure only (not everyone appreciates Barry Manilow). NO LARGE GROUPS. How would you feel if an office party parked next to you on the beach? NO CAMPFIRES. Hibachi grills work great, but watch your ashes. BOATS in the common areas are not common property…please respect the boats’ owners and do not use private boats.  Violators shall be forced to walk the plank! Most importantly — HAVE FUN! Annual Dues & Assessment Each year in early December, every property at Innsbrook, whether seasonal or permanent will be subject to an annual assessment. This bill will be sent by DNI Properties. This assessment includes funding for all of the owner association owned assets and staffing including the Charrette Creek Commons, Property Management, Maintenance, Roads and Trails, Common Ground beautification, Security staff and gate operations, billing and more. 2024 Year-End Assessment/Dues 24-25 All Home Types 24-25 Year End Condos 24-25 IBK Trustee Letter - coming soon 2024 Assessment Info IBK Nation email PDF 12.1.23 2023-24 Budget and Footnotes FINAL 12.1.23 2023-24 Assessment Itemized CONDOS YE 2023-24 Assessment Itemized All Home Types 2023 State of the IBK Nation Trustee Letter 2023 Annual Report 2025 Innsbrook Community Report Click here to watch and listen to the 2025 Annual Homeowner's and Trustee's Community Report. The survey takes about 20 minutes to complete, and asks about your satisfaction levels with various topics including activities, real estate, restaurants, and amenities. We use this survey as part of our decision making process as we move forward on new additions and maintenance priorities. Whether you m ake Innisbrook your vacation destination or permanent residence, enjoy a home with resort amenities at your doorstep. Reside in a spacious lodge set in peaceful woodland glen, in an executive suite, or in a one-, two-, or three-bedroom suite. Salamander Collection provides full resort services for resort rental guests and owner-members and offers an optional rental program for owners. For more information, please contact us: 727.942.5210 | [email protected] View Condo Price List Invest in Paradise As a condominium owner, you have the unique opportunity to transform your golf and vacation retreat into an income source by submitting your property to the Resort Rental Pool. When you plan to stay, enjoy the comfort and convenience of staying at your own condo for vacation, for less than a typical rental fee. Club Membership Unlimited use of golf courses, no greens fees. Become a golf member with preferred access to the resort’s four golf courses including Copperhead, home of the PGA TOUR's Valspar Championship. As a golf member indulge in waived golf greens and tennis court fees; substantial discounts on golf cart fees, dining at resort clubhouse restaurants, and on purchases of golf merchandise or equipment in our three golf shops. Look forward to member-only social events and golf tournaments — the perfect excuse to meet fellow members, relax and enjoy your condominium throughout the year. Unique Rental Program Receive income, even when your condominium is not occupied. When you’re not partaking in golf and vacation fun, you have the option of participating in the Resort Rental Pool Program to receive a portion of the resort’s total room revenue. You’ll receive income from your condominium, regardless of whether it was utilized by the resort. And as part of the rental program, you’ll have access to supervision, maintenance and repairs making ownership a worry-free, hassle-free, and an opportunity to offset expenses. resort amenities included with your golf membership: More than 600 acres of private, wooded, and lush rolling hills and lakes Five spacious condominium floor plans Sixty-three holes of world-class golf including Copperhead, host of the PGA TOUR’s Valspar Championship A top-rated tennis/pickleball facility and instructional programs Six swimming pools including the Loch Ness Pool (with waterslides) Endless biking, nature, and jogging trails Five outstanding restaurants The Salamander Spa, 12,000 sq ft of full-service serenity Innisbrook Real Estate Services Sales Recap Association Fees Customer Relationship Summary Business Continuity Plan View Available Condominiums Please note: prices and availability are subject to change without notice. If you enjoy creating exciting experiences and delivering quality service with a passion, we are interested in you. We encourage our staff of Service Professionals to use imagination and innovation to create positive memories for our guests and members. We look for people who exemplify good character, have respect for others and who demonstrate ownership. At Innisbrook, we want to create an environment that allows our staff to grow with the Company. Does this sound good to you? Then, please apply. We look forward to meeting you. Benefits Innisbrook offers competitive wages and benefits. Benefits vary and may include: Aggressive Paid Time Off – Three weeks of PTO in your first year 8 Paid holidays Free golf for all employees Free meals each day you work Paid leave for new parents Great group health insurance options Free, on-site fitness center for employees $125 standard rate at all Salamander properties Spa & Food and Beverage discounts Generous 401(k) matching Great property access privileges so you and your family can enjoy Innisbrook About Innisbrook Resort is situated on 600 beautifully wooded acres of rolling hills in Palm Harbor on Florida’s beautiful Gulf Coast. It is conveniently located just 25 minutes from the award winning Tampa International Airport. The resort features four championship golf courses designed by legend Larry Packard, 300 spacious guest accommodations, four restaurants, three bars, the Innisbrook Golf Academy, 11 har-tru clay tennis courts, the luxurious Salamander Spa with 12 treatment rooms, a state-of-the-art fitness center, and six heated swimming pools. Innisbrook hosts the PGA TOUR’s nationally televised VALSPAR Championship each April on its famed Copperhead Course. Innisbrook Resort is nestled on 600 acres of rolling hills and 70 acres of lakes on the west coast of Central Florida Only 20 miles from Tampa International Airport, the Resort appeals to visitors seeking the ultimate golf resort experience in a locale that is easily accessible and is within minutes of the beaches on the Gulf of Mexico. Innisbrook's collection of four championship golf courses is among the finest in America and is proud to host the PGA TOUR's Valspar Championship every March. With 300 spacious guest rooms and suites, 35,000 square feet of conference facilities and the luxurious Salamander Spa, Innisbrook is the perfect place for leisurely getaways and group meetings. Sign Up Innisbrook resort Where Champions Come to Play This golf haven is home to four championship courses including Copperhead, host of the PGA TOUR’s Valspar Championship. Driving through Innisbrook Resort’s welcome gates, you’ll get carried away by rolling hills and peaceful lakes set across the spacious property. Ideal for group trips with endless activities for all — unwind at six pools, indulge at our restaurants, practice tennis, and pamper yourself at the luxurious Salamander Spa. Find joy and solace in your private getaway. Innisbrook’s condo-style accommodations give guests a flexible stay to make your vacation comfortable and easy. Our 600 acres of natural beauty and activities make for a memorable experience for families, golf friends, and large groups alike. Indoor and outdoor event spaces can be customized to fulfill your every need; and with airports nearby, it’s as accessible as it is delightful.
